data.actual_result: Build-in mic fails to connect to Discord.
data.expected_result: When you talk while in VC, your voice should be transmitted and heard by others.
data.short_description: Internal mic with Pixel 3 XL doesn't transmit any sound.
data.steps_to_repro: - First, set microphone permissions for Discord - Second, open Discord with Pixel 3 XL - Third, join any voice chat/channel - Fourth, speak in a chat with built-in mic
